name: Red War
description: The Last City is under attack by the Red Legion. It's time to fight back.

name: Curse of Osiris
description: A new season has begun! Venture into the Infinite Forest, uncover the mysteries of Osiris, and seek new challenges on Mercury.

name: Warmind
description: A new season has begun! Search for relics of the past, learn the secrets of Rasputin, and unearth things long forgotten beneath the frozen surface of Mars.

name: Season of the Outlaw
description: This season introduced two new locations: the Tangled Shore and the Dreaming City. The narrative centered on avenging the death of the beloved Hunter Vanguard, Cayde-6, by pursuing his killers, the Scorned Barons.

name: Season of the Forge
description: A new season has begun! Rediscover the glories of the past and acquire beautiful new instruments of destruction.

name: Season of the Drifter
description: A new season has begun! Choose what kind of Guardian you will become. Reckon with the path that lies ahead.

name: Season of Opulence
description: A new season has begun! Lavish yourself in gifts from the mighty Emperor Calus. Seek lost treasures throughout the system.

name: Shadowkeep
description: ...in circles. Ancient enemies return to plague old battlegrounds. Time moves...

name: Season of the Undying
description: ...in circles. Ancient enemies return to plague old battlegrounds. Time moves...

name: Season of Dawn
description: Re-entwine the strands of time on Mercury and ignite the flames of hope.

name: Season of the Worthy
description: With the Almighty bearing down on the Last City, Guardians from all walks of life unite to bring all their power to bear against the Cabal sun-killer and forge new bonds with old rivals.

name: Season of Arrivals
description: The Almighty bears down on the Last City. Join forces with unlikely allies to avert this crisis and destroy the last vestige of Cabal power in the system.

name: Beyond Light
description: As the Pyramids send the system into chaos, Guardians must work with unexpected allies to hunt the monstrous forces of Xivu Arath and unravel the Hive god's network of mysterious cryptoliths.

name: Season of the Hunt
description: As the Pyramids send the system into chaos, Guardians must work with unexpected allies to hunt the monstrous forces of Xivu Arath and unravel the Hive god's network of mysterious cryptoliths.

name: Season of the Chosen
description: Battle Empress Caiatl's forces and prove your strength against the champions of the Cabal.

name: Season of the Splicer
description: As the Last City is consumed by an Endless Night, Guardians must hack their way through the Vex Network with help from Mithrax, the Sacred Splicer.

name: Season of the Lost
description: Savathûn has been brought out of hiding, revealing a harrowing discovery that shakes the Vanguard. As Xivu Arath prepares to capture her sister, Savathûn offers you a bargain: free her from her worm, and she will reveal the truth about the Darkness.

name: 30th Anniversary
description: Special event

name: Witch Queen
description: When Savathûn's Lucent Hive threaten the source of the Guardians' power, survival depends on the fragile alliance between the Vanguard and Empress Caiatl. Wielding a spear imbued with Light-suppressing technology, the Guardian must work with Lord Saladin and Caiatl's most trusted Psion to search for secrets in the minds of the Lucent Hive and stop their ghoulish plans.

name: Season of the Risen
description: When Savathûn's Lucent Hive threaten the source of the Guardians' power, survival depends on the fragile alliance between the Vanguard and Empress Caiatl. Wielding a spear imbued with Light-suppressing technology, the Guardian must work with Lord Saladin and Caiatl's most trusted Psion to search for secrets in the minds of the Lucent Hive and stop their ghoulish plans.

name: Season of the Haunted
description: The prison ship of the exiled Cabal Emperor Calus has returned. But its reappearance heralds the beginning of the end as the once-dormant lunar Pyramid stirs to life once more. With the aid of Eris Morn's witchcraft, the Guardian must work with Empress Caiatl, Commander Zavala, and Crow to unravel the mysteries of the Leviathan and the lunar Pyramid and stop Calus before it is too late.

name: Season of the Plunder
description: Eramis, Kell of House Salvation, has broken free from her icy prison on Europa. As she rallies the old Pirate Lords of Eliksni legend, the Guardian must assemble a motley crew of their own and retrieve powerful relics of Darkness before they fall into Eramis's hands.

name: Season of the Seraph
description: Assist Ana Bray and Osiris in finding a way to restore the Warmind, Rasputin, in order to combat the enemies of Sol.

name: Lightfall
description: In the aftermath of the Witness's attack, the Vanguard calls upon its closest allies. The Guardian must master the righteous powers of the Awoken to stand against the encroaching Shadow Legion and prove themselves as Queensguard.

name: Season of Defiance
description: In the aftermath of the Witness's attack, the Vanguard calls upon its closest allies. The Guardian must master the righteous powers of the Awoken to stand against the encroaching Shadow Legion and prove themselves as Queensguard.

name: Season of the Deep
description: Delve into the depths of Titan's methane sea in search of lost technology and knowledge.

name: Season of the Witch
description: Savathûn's Ghost Immaru has approached the Vanguard with a dire bargain: the Witch Queen holds the information we need to pursue the Witness and will share it with us if we first contend with her sister, Xivu Arath.  Through the power of arcane rituals, the Guardians must gather tithes for Eris Morn so she can fulfill this dangerous pact with the Hive god of lies.

name: Season of the Wish
description: Return to the Dreaming City and aid Queen Mara in making one last wish.

name: Into the Light
description: Return to the Dreaming City and aid Queen Mara in making one last wish.

name: The Final Shape
description: As the system reels in the wake of the events of the Final Shape, an unknown object impacts Nessus. Guardians must venture deep into the mysterious core of Nessus and deal with an awakening threat wielding an incredible and terrifying new power.

name: Episode 1: Echoes
description: As the system reels in the wake of the events of the Final Shape, an unknown object impacts Nessus. Guardians must venture deep into the mysterious core of Nessus and deal with an awakening threat wielding an incredible and terrifying new power.

name: Episode 2: Revenant
description: All is not well for the Eliksni. A paracausal curse is slowly corrupting Mithrax, the leader of House Light, while an old threat has re-emerged to plague the system with a new breed of Revenant Scorn. With Eido's help, Guardians face a kinetic battle against the renewed Scorn, and a metaphysical one for the fate of Mithrax's soul.

name: Episode 3: Heresy
description: The Dreadnaught returns. Powerful Taken threaten to overwhelm the system. To survive the onslaught, the Guardians must learn the secrets of Taken power—and harness them.

name: Crimson Days
description: Welcome to Crimson Days, "Your partner is your life." —Lord Shaxx Fight alongside a teammate and work together to crush your opponents.

name: The Dawning
description: Complete limited-time Event Card challenges to earn various rewards and make progress toward event Title completion.

name: The Revelry
description: Celebrated the joy of spring

name: The Guardian Games
description: Complete limited-time Event Card challenges to earn various rewards and make progress toward event Title completion.
